name: IEEE--2019 the 2nd International Conference on Information and Computer Technologies (ICICT 2019)--Ei & Scopus
content: \*Publication and Indexing: Accepted and registered full papers will be published into the IEEE conference proceedings, which will be indexed by 【Ei & Scopus】etc. The conference proceedings of ICICT 2018 is online already, details please visit【https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/xpl/mostRecentIssue.jsp?punumber=8355492】 \*Submission: By Email: icict@academic.net By online submission system: https://easychair.org/conferences/?conf=icict2019
